title: zom10
author: zom10
created_time: August 30, 2022, 06:53:54 PMLast edit: September 01, 2022, 06:47:09 PM by zom10
content: Shiba Inu Learn https://shibalearn.site/Play, Learn and Earn WELCOME TO Shiba Smart METAVERSEImagine being paid to learn. Shiba Learn is the world's first app where you get paid for what you learn. You can earn as much as $340 a month just by taking courses in the following areas: programming, business, English, and other 80 topics posted on the platform. It's easy to start earning. Buy your own NFT character and start earning while you learn, or just borrow someone else's NFT and share the profits with the owner without investing your own capital.Your earnings are accumulated in your digital wallet and can be cashed in real dollars at any time. You can also spend in-game currency to upgrade existing NFTs and create new ones, and that's improving gameplay, increasing your chances of winning PvP or increasing your earning potential.Each NFT character has daily energy, which is converted into training rewards. Each time you give the right answers during training, some of the energy is converted into Shiby tokens. You can then exchange Shiby tokens for USDT or USDC.Shiba Learn is part of the Shiba Inu ecosystem and operates on the Learn-to-earn model.The Shiba Smart metaverse and the Shiba Learn app are scheduled to launch in December, 2022. The app is currently in beta testing.The NFT Marketplace is scheduled to launch in September, 2022. There you will be able to buy your character to start learning in the Shiba Learn app.For rapid development, we plan to attract private investors and funds by creating favorable and attractive conditions for them.Now is the first round of ICO (PRE-ICO) for 100 billion Shiby tokens.Bonuses!You have a unique opportunity to buy Shiby tokens at a low price and participate in the development of the platform. You can buy Shiby tokens in your personal investor account.Register in your personal account  https://lk-shibalearn.site/ and get  50,000 bonus SHIBY for free.GENERAL RULESWe are allocating 50 000 000 000 Shiby Tokens✔️All rewards will be available in your personal account: https://lk-shibalearn.site/✔️After the end of the ICO, you will receive a reward to your Metamask wallet.✔️ Bounty will run 12 week✔️ The token distribution process to participants (our supporters) will be arranged and carried out by the Shiba Smart team.✔️ Participants who do not follow the rules of each campaign will not get stakes/reward✔️ All participants must join Dashboard https://lk-shibalearn.site/  Registration in Dashboard-50 000 Shiby  bonus✔️ All participants must join Telegram:  https://t.me/shibalearn ✔️ All participants must join Twitter:  https://twitter.com/LearnInu✔️ Using multiple accounts, cheating, and spamming are not allowed. You will be disqualified from the bounty program immediately, and all your accounts will be banned permanently.✔️ We reserve the right to suspend or have the allocation reduced on a certain bounty if we found it underperforming.✔️ We reserve the right to make changes on any terms if it’s reasonable to do so✔️ We reserve the right to remove a participant from the campaign for a valid reason.✔️ By agreeing to this rule, you are subject to the existing rulesProof of Authentication Post FormatCode:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username:Bitcointalk Profile Link:telegram Username:Campaign Participated:Name in Dashboard https: https://lk-shibalearn.site/BEP-20 Wallet Address:Registration in Dashboard-50 000 Shiby bonus Example:Proof of Authentication PostBitcointalk Username: zom10Bitcointalk Profile Link: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3102585telegram Username: shibalearnCampaign Participated: twitterName in Dashboard https://lk-shibalearn.site/: Frank HarveyBEP-20 Wallet Address:777777777777g7777vThe start of the campaign on Twitter 30.08.22. For now, you can register in your personal account https://lk-shibalearn.site/ and get 50,000 bonus SHIBY for free.Bounty SheduleWeek 1 (30.08 - 6.09)Week 2 (7.09 - 14.09)Week 3 (14.09 - 21.09)Week 4 (21.09 - 28.09)Submit your weekly report on bounty thread.Twitter CampaignRewards:- Have more than 500 followers: 100 000 Shiby /week- Have more than 2500 followers: 200 000 Shiby/week- Have more than 5001 followers: 300 000 Shiby/week- Have more than 10,001 followers: 400 000 Shiby /week Rules:  - Every participant must follow the https://twitter.com/LearnInu - Twitter account must have a minimum of 500 followers- Twitter account must be original (90% in Twitter audit)- You must make minimum of 5 retweets & 3 tweets per week. Mention Quantum DAO Fund, use a minimum of 3 hashtags, a maximum of 10, use a different hashtag every tweet or retweets  #bitcoin  #ido #bitcoinnews #investment  #investor #investingtips #diskusi #discus #medsos #mediapartner #socialmedia #ico #teknologi #technology #techno #application #dao #nft  #nfts #ethereum #nft #dao #investor #blockchain #blockchaintechnology #blockchainnews #blockchainwallet- Every retweet must be likedReport Format:You must post all your retweet links and tweets in the following format every week, otherwise your bet will not be rewarded:Bitcointalk username:Twitter Profile Link:Name in Dashboard https://lk-shibalearn.site/:Week 1Retweet Link 1Retweet Link 2Retweet Link 3Retweet Link 4Retweet Link 5Week 1Tweet Link 1Tweet Link 2Tweet Link 3To get a bounty for a week, the report must be completed in full.
